page.title: 14OUTDOOR FACILITIES -L'MOUTH.
page.content: In one part of our town,there is a Marine Park,which has many facilities for both tourists and local people.There is an excellent 18-hole putting-green which offers a relaxing afternoon's pleasure.Bowling is popular with many of the town's inhabitants,young and old alike.The green is of a high standard.Two tennis-courts provide fitness and fun for all the family.The Marine Park is open at the weekends in June and every day in July and August.There is also a private Bowling Club situated beside the Stotfield Hotel.Refreshments can be obtained after play ends.A short distance from there is the well-known {MORAY GOLF CLUB .}
